concept.title: The props attribute
concept.shortdesc:
The props attribute is only used for
new metadata attributes.

conbody.p:
The props attribute is technically one of the select (or condition) attributes, designed for filtering and flagging during publishing. However, the props attribute is not intended to be used within a topic or document. It is provided to be used as the basis for
condition attributes.
Do not use this attribute when authoring DITA topics or maps.
